title: This app needs help.
text: You guys should get some better developers on your team. I could build a better app for your system in less than a few hours. It needs to be able to switch temperature measurements, between Celsius and Fahrenheit. Also, there is a major bug in which when I open a photo or video, then click the back button- the app force closes. Please find some better developers - because this is junk.

title: compatibility issue
text: Not pairing on iphone with ios 9.3 when using the 3G connectivity.
